General.Name: Orestone Mining Corp
General.Description: Orestone Mining Corp., junior mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, copper, and molybdenum porphyry deposits. It holds 100% interest in the Captain property covering an area of 9,692 hectares located near Fort St. James, British Columbia. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 885 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3H4

2.Name: Mr. Mark Thomas Brown B.Com., B.Comm., C.A., CPA, CA, CPA
